II. You are my son. In the natural affection I have for you, I hereby grant you, in fulfillment of my intention to make a permanent estate for you during my lifetime, all that has come to me by inheritance, all that is in my possession, all that I have full right to, all that no one else has any right to, all that is not subject to any mortgage or other encumbrance. I hereby transfer to you, without any consideration whatsoever, the immovable property, valued at Rs. 8,00,000/- (literally eight lakh rupees), free of charge and with all rights, the property as detailed in the schedule below, and take immediate possession of it. You shall pay all taxes payable on the property, and shall have the municipal taxes and electricity charges registered in your name, and you shall enjoy the property with all rights over the property, with the right to gift, sell and dispose of it, with the right to enjoy it freely and freely, with the right to enjoy it for a lifetime This is my consent to this settlement document being written in your name.
III. Schedule : Vizianagaram District, Vizianagaram Joint Subdistrict|| Yilaka, Vizianagaram

I hereby certify that there are no stone mines, machinery, fish ponds etc. and that the property transferred by this deed is not an assignee property/Government property as per Section 22-A of the Registration Act. It is not an Endowment Department property. I hereby certify that the deed registered under Section 22-B of the Registration Act in respect of the property transferred by this deed has not been cancelled by any court order and that no irregularities have been made in the Income Tax (EC) details relating to the property. I hereby agree to take legal action against us and be liable to pay the depreciation tax if any such factual details are found to have been concealed in this deed. sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement deed No. 7004 of 2025, dated 02/Dec/2025, executed by Karanam Yellamma, in favour of her Son, Karanam Isshak, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 44.63Sq.Yds, bearing house number 21-32-14/3, Assessment no. 1093041297, M.C. Ward-21, comprised in survey number 196/1 Part, situated in Vizianagaram Muncipal Corporation, within the District of Vizianagaram, registered at sub-registrar office Vizianagaram (R.O)(212), is bounded as follows: North by: House of Karanam Sambamurthy South by: House of Karanam Muthyalamma East by: House of Matta Jagannadham West by: C.C. Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
